local_intent: Execute place phase: perceive red_plate, move above it, descend until contact, release by opening gripper, then retreat and wait.
assumptions: red_plate is visible and reachable at execution time
gripper currently holds the white plate from prior steps
contact sensor and force thresholds are functional
coherence_with_global: Directly implements the GLOBAL_BT place-phase sequence (DetectObject -> MoveAbove -> LowerUntilContact -> OpenGripper -> Retreat -> Wait) and matches the LOCAL_ANNOTATION active leaf parameters.
